name: Tea Parties Bursting With Color
title: "Tea Parties Bursting With Color" Escoffier
in_play_description: After your character uses a Normal Attack: Triggers your Cooking Mek: Cold Storage Mode's End Phase effect. (Its Usages will not decrease, once per Round)

attributes.source: Reward for inviting Escoffier to a duel at The Cat's Tail and achieving all corresponding challenge objectives

skills.desc:
Combat Action: When your active character is Escoffier, equip this card.
After Escoffier equips this card, immediately use Low-Temperature Cooking once.
When your other character uses a Normal Attack: Triggers your Cooking Mek: Cold Storage Mode's End Phase effect. (Its Usages will not decrease, once per Round)
(You must have Escoffier in your deck to add this card to your deck.)
